title: (PSX-PSP) Mortal Kombat Trilogy converted properly (Kingdom-game
description:
MORTAL KOMBAT TRILOGY:

MORTAL KOMBAT TRILOGY brings the whole MORTAL KOMBAT universe to the PlayStation on one disc. Die-hard fans of the series will go krazy over all-new finishing moves and a new secret character: Chameleon. In addition to the multitude of great-looking backgrounds and digitized characters, MORTAL KOMBAT TRILOGY also includes more options, as players can do more than change the difficulty and toggle the violence mode; a new feature called "auto" combos can be used, which make the standard multi-button attacks much easier to pull off. You can also take on a friend in the Multiplayer mode and see who is the real king of kombat. Of course, no MORTAL KOMBAT game would be complete without all the fatalities and other staples of the MK franchise, and TRILOGY is no exception.


Tested and working on CFW 5.00 m33-4 combined with the 500 popsloader pack and 3.72 POPS......KloWn
